conbody.p: (c)(5) Clarification concerning the proper application of wage rate schedules to the type or types of construction involved shall be obtained fromâ€”
(A) For the Army - The appropriate district commander, Corps of Engineers.
(B) For the Navy - The cognizant Naval Facilities Engineering Command division.
(C) For the Air Force - The appropriate Regional Industrial Relations Office.
